title: Sports Festival
welcome: The 1st Atsushi Tamura's Silicon Valley Sports Festival!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: We are excited to announce that a sports festival organized by Atsushi Tamura will be held in Silicon Valley. To all residents of the Bay Area, would you like to enjoy a nostalgic sports day in America? If you're worried about your fitness level, have back pain, or haven't run in years, don't worry! Participation in events is optional, so feel free to come and enjoy watching and cheering.

details.participants: Participants: Families residing in the Bay Area (others are welcome too)
details.fee: Fee: $20 for ages 12 and above (Free for under 12 years)
details.format: Format: Participants will be divided into 4 teams to compete for points in a friendly manner.
details.events: Events (Planned): Running races, tug of war, ball toss, giant ball rolling, dance competition, various relay races, and more.

form.event_description: Participation in events is not mandatory. It's okay if you don't want to participate in any events. This form helps us measure how many people are interested in which events. Please check at the venue on the day of the event to confirm which events will be held.
